scripts.dev: pnpm build:remotes && concurrently -n server,shell,city,weather,stock,podcast,ai -c blue,green,yellow,magenta,cyan,white,red "pnpm dev:server" "pnpm dev:shell" "pnpm preview:city" "pnpm preview:weather" "pnpm preview:stock" "pnpm preview:podcast" "pnpm preview:ai"
scripts.build:remotes: pnpm --filter @weather/city-search build && pnpm --filter @weather/weather-display build && pnpm --filter @weather/stock-tracker build && pnpm --filter @weather/podcast-player build && pnpm --filter @weather/ai-assistant build
scripts.dev:mf: concurrently "pnpm dev:shell" "pnpm preview:city" "pnpm preview:weather" "pnpm preview:stock" "pnpm preview:podcast" "pnpm preview:ai"
scripts.build:mf: pnpm --filter @weather/shell build && pnpm --filter @weather/city-search build && pnpm --filter @weather/weather-display build && pnpm --filter @weather/stock-tracker build && pnpm --filter @weather/podcast-player build && pnpm --filter @weather/ai-assistant build
scripts.test:mf: pnpm --filter @weather/shell test:run && pnpm --filter @weather/city-search test:run && pnpm --filter @weather/weather-display test:run && pnpm --filter @weather/stock-tracker test:run && pnpm --filter @weather/podcast-player test:run && pnpm --filter @weather/ai-assistant test:run
scripts.firebase:build: pnpm build:shared && pnpm firebase:build:mf && pnpm firebase:build:functions && pnpm firebase:assemble
scripts.firebase:build:mf: cross-env NODE_ENV=production pnpm --filter @weather/shell build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production pnpm --filter @weather/city-search build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production pnpm --filter @weather/weather-display build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production pnpm --filter @weather/stock-tracker build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production pnpm --filter @weather/podcast-player build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production pnpm --filter @weather/ai-assistant build
scripts.firebase:build:functions: cd functions && pnpm install && pnpm build
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules packages/*/node_modules packages/*/dist dist functions/node_modules functions/lib
